My friend Alex has recently broken up with his girlfriend too so he’s been feeling a little bit down. To those of you who have broken up and haven’t yet found new love: Keep your chin up ! You might find it worth your while to read “Men are from Mars women are from Venus” written by John Gray. He’s a relationship expert whose work elaborates the keys 🔐 to a successful long term relationship. I was reluctant to read it at first since I’m not an avid reader but it turned out to be worth my while as I’ve learnt loads about how men and women think differently. Many successful couples say this international bestseller is worth its weight in gold. You can also consult a social worker for what it’s worth. Take heart !💗
